title: Can I learn Quran from a teacher who does her eyebrows & some innovations? #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: so she I have a Quran teacher the last two months and uh I've seen some things like she said at the first that she was like from the but I've seen like some things like some things that she has like shaved eyebrows or some B that she does so should I stay with her or go with another teacher if you have another alternative who's truly from and walks the talk and uh about by the Sunnah yes you have to change this teacher because she is a bad example but if you don't have any other alternative and you're just learning Quran from her not taking anything uh regarding the Sunnah or the knowledge other than memorizing the Quran and fixing your recitation then there's no problem inshallah
